product_name: Not Your Mother'sTravel Size Curl Talk Curl Activating Hair Mousse
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNot Your Mother's Curl Talk Activating Mousse defines, volumizes, and fights frizz with a lightweight, touchable hold. It protects against humidity while keeping curls soft and bouncy. Protein-free and perfect for all curl types, it's free of sulfates, silicones, and parabens.
details: DetailsBenefitsEnhances curl shape and boosts volumeHelps curls hold their shape while maintaining natural movementSmooths and tames frizz for a sleek, polished lookProvides flexible control without stiffness or crunchGentle formula hydrates curls without added proteinProtects vibrancy and shine while defining curlsWorks for all curly and wavy hair types, enhancing natural texture at every levelFeatures fresh notes of lemon, jasmine, rose water, sunflower, and sandalwoodScent TypeCitrus Jasmine ScentFormulated WithoutSulfate surfactantsSiliconesParabensDrying alcoholItem 2587921How To UseShake vigorously. Dispense upside down into hand. Start at roots and work evenly through curls. Style as usual. Safe for natural and color-treated hair.Pre-caution: Contents under pressure. Do not puncture or incinerate. Do not store at temperatures above 120°f. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Avoid spraying in eyes. Avoid spraying on broken skin. Intentional misuse by concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Polyquaternium-46, Isobutane, Propane, Propylene Glycol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Oleth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Benzophenone-4, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake vigorously. Dispense upside down into hand. Start at roots and work evenly through curls. Style as usual. Safe for natural and color-treated hair.Pre-caution: Contents under pressure. Do not puncture or incinerate. Do not store at temperatures above 120°f. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Avoid spraying in eyes. Avoid spraying on broken skin. Intentional misuse by concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: My Fav Mousse!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product line since I started getting perms again!  I love this mousse so much!  It's so rich and a little goes a long way.  The price is what originally drew me to the product and now this product line is my go to for everything!  It will always have a place in my daily hair care routine!

reviews.headline: no
reviews.comments: left hair to sticjy, does not have a good scent

reviews.headline: Love love it
reviews.comments: I have s perm it really helps

reviews.headline: Best mousse
reviews.comments: My favorite mousse. It goes so far and helps with frizziness so much.

reviews.headline: Do not like. Planning on returning it.
reviews.comments: Do not like. Planning on returning it.

reviews.headline: DONT BELIEVE THE BAD REVIEWS
reviews.comments: As someone with wavy to curly hair Ive tried so many products but this is only one that has stayed consistent since day 1. The people here saying that its sticky just need to wash there hands I would say hair gel is more sticky. Next, it doesnt leave the hair crispy or sticky. YOU HAVE TO WAIT FOR YOUR HAIR TO DRY. After a while the "crunch" goes away. You can use an oil if your impatient. I truley believe that this is one of the best mousse on the market, and Ive boughten probably 10+ cans. Im happy they know have a jumbo can at a reasonable price compared to high end brands.

reviews.headline: sticky hair
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this, I really did. I love the curl talk line. Unfortunately, It made my hair so so sticky though. it stuck to my shoulders and nexk and every time I touched my hair to move it out of my face or pull it to the side it left a sticky film on my hands. at least it defined my hair. so if you dont care about sticky, this is great. I just have sensory issues which made this whole product unusable for me

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: Goopy and sticky

reviews.headline: Amazing Product
reviews.comments:
The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because after a few uses the nozzle no longer dispenses correctly. It does not foam out anymore, and only dispenses liquid to hardly anything.

If that wasn't an issue, it'd easily be a 10/10. The product itself is amazing but the dispense of it is a bit flawed.

reviews.headline: Just dont
reviews.comments:
I wish so could select zero stars

This crap is so sticky it pulls your hair out with every stroke; don't bother

reviews.headline: GOING ON MY 3RDDDD
reviews.comments:
LOVE LOVE LOVEEEEE!!!!!
I mainly use this for slickbacks not curls though because my hair is wavy not curly lol. Butttttt I have tried to curl my hair and it does work!!!! I put a little in my damp hair and scrunch and my hair stays curly. So from my expiernce with not-so curly hair, it seems to work pretty well! Now for slickbackss.... AMAZING!!!! I have used so many products for slickbacks and this is the best one. It lasts ALL day so well, my fly aways stay down, it's easy to style because I have time to style and make it perfect before it dries, and it makes my hair look slick and shiny!!! I used lots at the beach when it was super windy, so I had hair that wasn't annoying but was still so cute. I used a bunch and I still have lots left. Great about and very affordable. 11/10 recommend!!!

reviews.headline: Great Mousse! Not drying or crunchy!
reviews.comments: I have 2c/3a curl pattern.  When applied to wet hair and allowed to dry this creates a 'cast' around the curls.  Once dry break the cast and you will have frizz free and bouncy curls.  Helps my curls last for 2-3 days.

reviews.headline: Be Careful
reviews.comments: Be careful! This mousse comes out fast and in large amounts.

reviews.headline: Nozzle broke.
reviews.comments: I liked it but the nozzle broke. I bought this small size for vacation so I was pretty annoyed. Will be returning hopefully.

reviews.headline: Horrible product! Broke off tons of hair.
reviews.comments:
This product is one of the worst things ive ever used in my hair. So much of my hair broke off and I used their heat protectant too. 

Do not buy this super damaging mousse.

reviews.headline: Lightweight hold with no crunch
reviews.comments: For context I have waist length 2B hair and I don't have to use a lot to cover my entire head. The scent is pleasant and not overwhelming. The hold is light, which is what I prefer so it doesn't weigh down my hair. The hold doesn't last more than two days for me but I have to wash my hair and treat my scalp every other day anyways so that's no biggie for me.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: I love this product it is sooo good!! I have atleast bought 3 and i will keep buying forever! Its goes in the hair easily and smoothly and it gives a nice crunch it leaves the hair not frizzy shiny and bouncy!!!!!! The only thing is i am sad that that the price went up! And somtimes comes out liquidy!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I love this news. It gives just the right amount of hold and looks natural when dry

reviews.headline: My fav
reviews.comments: this is the only mousse that works for my hair. I have blond frizzy curly hair and this fixed the frizz and adds to my curls

reviews.headline: Cheap Packaging :(
reviews.comments: For the past two years of buying this product, i've finally had enough with the horrible packaging. the Nozzle breaks off so easily

media.headline: Crunchy but good
media.caption: I straightened my hair, added mousse and then brushed it down. Helped control frizz all night! It was 90% humidity that night, so I was impressed.

media.headline: Lovely
media.caption: Dry + a lot of humidity 😂 lol

media.headline: Haven't used mousse in years, love this!

faceoff_positive.comments: Talk about a product that keeps your curls POPPIN all day. This right here is my holy grail hair product. It really helps activate your natural curl pattern and controls that frizz (along with just a LITTLE bit of the sculpting gel). After applying this product on my wash day i barely have to refresh the following day and so on. Never stop selling this!
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVEEE this product.

faceoff_negative.comments: I love the mousse but the smell is god awful. Please, please make it unscented of just change the scent all together. It stinks when you put it on and my god if you go swimming the stench is awful.
faceoff_negative.headline: Fragrance
